questionText: How often do you purchase fashion pieces?
Where do you usually shop for fashion pieces?

answers.answerText: General High Street/Fast Fashion (eg. H&M, prettylittlething, SHEIN, Zara)
Mid-high tier high street (eg. All saints, coast & Other Stories, ARKET, House of CB, Mango)
Second hand stores (eg charity shops, depop, ebay, vinted)

questionText: How long do you usually keep fashion items for?

answers.answerText: I keep them until they are no longer functional/they no longer fit
I keep them until I no longer enjoy the style of the item
I keep them until they are no longer on trend
I keep them until I have worn them/been seen in the item once-a few times

questionText: If you notice an item in your wardrobe is damaged, what do you usually do?

answers.answerText: Repair the item/take it to get repaired
Dispose of the item and/or replace it

questionText: How do you usually dispose of your fashion items?
